      • getShopAmount

        public int getShopAmount(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer p)
        Get the amount of shops of a player
        Parameters:
        p - Player, whose shops should be counted
        Returns:
        The amount of a shops a player has (if Config.exclude_admin_shops is true, admin shops won't be counted)
